data.actual_result: Copies the name but adds a space and a "-"
data.expected_result: copies the name and maybe adds a space
data.short_description: Highlighting the name of a user with the space after it than copying it adds a "-" to the name
data.steps_to_repro: - Highlight someone's name on a chat message (make sure to include the space next to it)- Paste it somewhere
